*Solemn nod*

It is as rAuq has mentioned.  Elections are going to be held for both seats.  
Normally an emergency election would be held for just rAuq's seat but since 
Azure was an appointment anyway ... it seems like it's time to hold them 
again.  I trust no one is going to take this too personally.

**Anyone who wishes to run must send me a private letter by next Friday! NO 
EXCEPTIONS!!!**

On a related note I'm going to begin taking nominations in the following 
categories soon, so start thinking about it, and no nominating yourself.  
I'll let you know more after the elections.
<A HREF="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=321945">
-Best story-line creator:
-Best male character:
-Best female character:
-Best arrival sequence:
-Best departure/death sequence:
-Best Love Story (basically the two characters who have had the longest and 
mushiest romance.):
-Best villain:
-Best hero:
-Best leader overall:
-Who is the best RPGer in the Neo Beast Wars RPG?</A>

--part1_f7.244e1658.2b0879db_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
